Text:
TvTeam seems to be back to its old tricks again. where they don't seed some torrents to get people to sign up to the site TorrentDay.. They are not seeding this torrent, and they didn't seed PBS NOVA Lizard Kings either.. I was able to get the latter from another site and helped to seed it so people could download.  I'll try and do the same for this one.  

Stop with this crap, TvTeam.
